attributes.title: Argus Limited
attributes.caption: Ruby Rose and her friends have been burdened with transporting the Relic of Knowledge safely to Atlas.
attributes.description: Ruby Rose and her friends have been burdened with transporting the Relic of Knowledge safely to Atlas. There's countless miles of Grimm-covered countryside between the city of Mistral and the northern coastline of Anima. Fortunately, the Argus Limited can easily make the journey... so long as nothing goes wrong.

attributes.title: Uncovered
attributes.caption: No matter how hard you may try to bury it, the past will always claw its way back to you.
attributes.description: No matter how hard you may try to bury it, the past will always claw its way back to you.

attributes.title: The Lost Fable
attributes.caption: What is your favorite fairy tale?
attributes.description: What is your favorite fairy tale?

attributes.title: So That's How It Is
attributes.caption: Heroes and villains alike are confronted with troubling revelations.
attributes.description: Heroes and villains alike are confronted with troubling revelations.
attributes.display_title: V6:E4 - So That's How It Is

attributes.title: The Coming Storm
attributes.caption: The spiders in Mistral always deliver, but shelter doesn't always guarantee safety.
attributes.description: The spiders in Mistral always deliver, but shelter doesn't always guarantee safety.

attributes.title: Alone in the Woods
attributes.caption: As darkness falls on Brunswick Farms and the snow continues to fall, Team RWBY's morale is at an all-time low. The only thing worse than being stranded, alone in the woods... is realizing you're not alone at all.
attributes.description: As darkness falls on Brunswick Farms and the snow continues to fall, Team RWBY's morale is at an all-time low. The only thing worse than being stranded, alone in the woods... is realizing you're not alone at all.

attributes.title: The Grimm Reaper
attributes.caption: While Cinder shares her plans with Neo, Maria shares her past with Team RWBY, and both groups are dead-set on making it to Atlas.
attributes.description: While Cinder shares her plans with Neo, Maria shares her past with Team RWBY, and both groups are dead-set on making it to Atlas.

attributes.title: Dead End
attributes.caption: The Atlas representatives in Argus have no intention of assisting Team RWBY. In fact, they're adamantly opposed to it. It's time to come up with a new solution... and it's time to tell Jaune, Nora, and Ren about Jinn.
attributes.description: The Atlas representatives in Argus have no intention of assisting Team RWBY. In fact, they're adamantly opposed to it. It's time to come up with a new solution... and it's time to tell Jaune, Nora, and Ren about Jinn.

attributes.title: Lost
attributes.caption: With Cinder gone, Emerald and Mercury are starting to raise questions, and they're not the only ones; Jaune, Nora, and Ren search for Oscar, but still aren't sure what they'll do if they find him.
attributes.description: With Cinder gone, Emerald and Mercury are starting to raise questions, and they're not the only ones; Jaune, Nora, and Ren search for Oscar, but still aren't sure what they'll do if they find him.

attributes.title: Stealing from the Elderly
attributes.caption: Our heroes have one shot to pull off the heist of their lives, and if they're going to succeed, they'll need everyone to do their part. It's go time.
attributes.description: Our heroes have one shot to pull off the heist of their lives, and if they're going to succeed, they'll need everyone to do their part. It's go time.

attributes.title: The Lady in the Shoe
attributes.caption: The only thing standing between our heroes and Atlas is Caroline Cordovin, but it will have to be a joint effort if they're going to bring her down. Meanwhile, Yang races to find Blake while Adam does his best to finish her.
attributes.description: The only thing standing between our heroes and Atlas is Caroline Cordovin, but it will have to be a joint effort if they're going to bring her down. Meanwhile, Yang races to find Blake while Adam does his best to finish her.
attributes.display_title: V6:E11 - The Lady in the Shoe

attributes.title: Seeing Red
attributes.caption: Our heroes are running out of time. As Cordovin continues to stand tall, Blake and Yang stand together, and all combatants must ask themselves, "How far am I willing to go to win?"
attributes.description: Our heroes are running out of time. As Cordovin continues to stand tall, Blake and Yang stand together, and all combatants must ask themselves, "How far am I willing to go to win?"

attributes.title: Our Way
attributes.caption: A Leviathan has emerged from the ocean depths and now threatens to destroy the city of Argus. With Cordo's Colossus incapacitated, the Atlas Base has little they can do to protect the people.
attributes.description: A Leviathan has emerged from the ocean depths and now threatens to destroy the city of Argus. With Cordo's Colossus incapacitated, the Atlas Base has little they can do to protect the people.
